timeline.message: add a writer that never skips empty or missing strings
always print the key in a map of structs
analyse config to detect map of scalar also
wire in special case for maps to avoid keys/values just disappearing
update unit tests with new expected output

timeline.bodyText: Consider renaming to keep_empty_strings, as I think that is easier to read. If so, also consider renaming WriteStringFieldNeverSkip to WriteStringFieldKeepEmpty or similar.
timeline.author: geirst
